enchantment.radenchants.appetite.desc: You are unable to eat. Reduces exhaustion rate.
enchantment.radenchants.breaching.desc: Has a chance to breach shields
enchantment.radenchants.climbing_gear.de: Allows rapid climbing of ladders, max level can instant-climb with right-click
enchantment.radenchants.dreams.desc: During slumber, high chance for negative effects, and chance for a nightmare to spawn
enchantment.radenchants.dual_edge.desc: Slaying enemies increases damage dealt and received
enchantment.radenchants.glare.desc: You stare daggers at enemies, harming those who lock eyes with you
enchantment.radenchants.gluttony.desc: Consume food faster, but with reduced nutritional value. No penalty at max level
enchantment.radenchants.hawk_eyes.desc: See farther when aiming, halved arrow damage, consecutive successful shots add magic damage
enchantment.radenchants.landmines.desc: Chance for lit TNT to spawn when you move
enchantment.radenchants.life_leech.desc: Heals the user for a portion of damage dealt
enchantment.radenchants.magical_blade.de: Converts a portion of damage to magic
enchantment.radenchants.moon_boots.desc: Jump higher and fall slower, Grants immunity to fall damage
enchantment.radenchants.one_man_army.des: Damage increases based on how many monsters are nearby
enchantment.radenchants.rabbits_feet.des: Jump higher and fall faster. Grants immunity to fall damage
enchantment.radenchants.ruthless.desc: Low health enemies take increased damage
enchantment.radenchants.safeguard.desc: Gains charges over time that completely blocks attacks
enchantment.radenchants.seventh.desc: Deals bonus damage counter will display sevens
enchantment.radenchants.shadow_glide.des: Grants Speed in low light areas
enchantment.radenchants.soul_mending.des: Repairs a percent of itself using victim's souls
enchantment.radenchants.tiger_claws.desc: Hitting a full health target with a critical empowers you and deals bonus damage
enchantment.radenchants.welding_apron.de: Reduces odds of Anvil damage during use
message.radenchants.insomnia: You can't seem to fall asleep
tooltip.radenchants.hawk_eyes: Hawk Eyes Streak: %s (%s of original arrow damage added as Magic)
